      • clearThumbnailsCache

        public static void clearThumbnailsCache(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        The thumbnails cached is not cleared when logging out a session because many sessions share the same thumbnails. This method must be called when performing an application logout i.e. logging out of all sessions.

      • saveFileMediaForUrl

        public void saveFileMediaForUrl(String mediaUrl,
                                String fileUrl,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                String mimeType)
        Replace a media cache by a file content. MediaUrl is the same model as the one used in loadBitmap.
        Parameters:
        mediaUrl - the mediaUrl
        fileUrl - the file which replaces the cached media.
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        mimeType - the mimeType.

      • saveFileMediaForUrl

        public void saveFileMediaForUrl(String mediaUrl,
                                String fileUrl,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                String mimeType,
                                boolean keepSource)
        Copy or Replace a media cache by a file content. MediaUrl is the same model as the one used in loadBitmap.
        Parameters:
        mediaUrl - the mediaUrl
        fileUrl - the file which replaces the cached media.
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        keepSource - keep the source file

        public String loadAvatarThumbnail(HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                  android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                  String url,
                                  int side)
        Load an avatar thumbnail. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - the home server config.
        imageView - Ihe imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        side - the avatar thumbnail side
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached.

      • loadAvatarThumbnail

        public String loadAvatarThumbnail(HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                  android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                  String url,
                                  int side,
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap aDefaultAvatar)
        Load an avatar thumbnail. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - the home server config.
        imageView - Ihe imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        side - the avatar thumbnail side
        aDefaultAvatar - the avatar to use when the Url is not reachable.
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached.

      • loadBitmap

        public String loadBitmap(HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                         android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                         String url,
                         int rotationAngle,
                         int orientation,
                         String mimeType,
                         EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from the url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        imageView - The imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached.

      • loadBitmap

        public String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                         HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                         String url,
                         int rotationAngle,
                         int orientation,
                         String mimeType,
                         EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from the url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        context - The context
        url - the image url
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached.

      • loadBitmap

        public String loadBitmap(HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                         android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                         String url,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int rotationAngle,
                         int orientation,
                         String mimeType,
                         EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are > 0, download a thumbnail. rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE when undefined : the EXIF metadata must be checked.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        imageView - The imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached

      • downloadIdFromUrl

        public String downloadIdFromUrl(String url)
        Returns the download ID from the media URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the media url
        Returns:
        the download ID

      • downloadMedia

        public String downloadMedia(android.content.Context context,
                            HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                            String url,
                            String mimeType,
                            EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Download a media.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        hsConfig - the home server config.
        url - the media url
        mimeType - the media mimetype
        encryptionInfo - the encryption information
        Returns:
        the download identifier.

      • launchSuspendedTask

        private void launchSuspendedTask()
        Start any suspended task

      • loadBitmap

        public String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                         HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                         android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                         String url,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int rotationAngle,
                         int orientation,
                         String mimeType,
                         File folderFile,
                         EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are > 0, download a thumbnail. The rotation angle is checked first. If rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, check the orientation is defined to a valid value. If the orientation is defined, request the properly oriented image to the server
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        hsConfig - the home server config
        imageView - the imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        folderFile - the folder where the media should be stored
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file information.
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached

      • loadBitmap

        public String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                         HomeserverConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                         android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                         String url,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int rotationAngle,
                         int orientation,
                         String mimeType,
                         File folderFile,
                         android.graphics.Bitmap aDefaultBitmap,
                         EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are > 0, download a thumbnail. The rotation angle is checked first. If rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, check the orientation is defined to a valid value. If the orientation is defined, request the properly oriented image to the server
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        hsConfig - the home server config
        imageView - the imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        folderFile - the folder where the media should be stored
        aDefaultBitmap - the default bitmap to use when the url media cannot be retrieved.
        encryptionInfo - the file encryption info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached

        Parameters:

        Returns:
